name: 余琬琴
objective: 本課程介紹物理學的基本觀念,並訓練學生運用這些基本觀念來解決科學問題, 內容包括線動量,轉動,力矩,角動量,靜力平衡,簡諧運動,及波等主題
schedule:
1. Potential energy and energy conservation
2. Momentum, impulse, and collisions (I)
3. Momentum, impulse, and collisions (II)
4. Rotation of rigid bodies (I)
5. Rotation of rigid bodies (II)
6. Exam 1
7. Dynamics of rotational motion (I)
8. Dynamics of rotational motion (II)
9. Equilibrium and elasticity (I)
10. Equilibrium and elasticity (II)
11. Exam 2
12. Periodic motion (I)
13. Periodic  motion  (II)
14. Mechanical Waves (I)
15. Mechanical Waves (II)
16. Review
17. Exam 3
materials:
教科書: University Physics by Young and Freedman, Vol. 1, 14 Ed, Pearson 
高立圖書
